transcript.title: THE RT HON SIR JOHN GORTON GCMG AC CH
transcript.content:
Following a private family service and cremation held in Sydney on 22 May 2002, a State Memorial Service for the late the Right Honourable Sir John Gorton, GCMG, AC, CH, former Prime Minister of Australia, will be held at St Andrew';s Anglican Cathedral, Sydney Square, cnr. George and Bathurst Streets, Sydney at 11.30 am on Friday 31 May 2002.
Public Notices with further details will be placed in the press shortly.
